Patent Information.Patent Title: Anti-microbial Peptides And Methods Of Use Thereof
Patent Information.Abstract: Anti-microbial peptides and methods of use are provided.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Aeromonas salmonicida (MIC=10 µg/ml), Cytophaga aquatilis (MIC=5 µg/ml), Yersinia rukeri (MIC=15 µg/ml), Edwardsiella ictaluri (MIC=10 µg/ml), Lactococcus garvieae (MIC=10 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Parasin I, an antimicrobial peptide derived from histon H2A in the catfish, Parasilurus asotus.
Literature.Author: Park IY, Park CB, Kim MS, Kim SC.
